## FacetsCssClasses interface

The CSS class interface used for [Facets()](./answers-react-components.facets.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FacetsCssClasses extends FiltersCssClasses 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [FiltersCssClasses](./answers-react-components.filterscssclasses.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [button?](./answers-react-components.facetscssclasses.button.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Applies to Apply button and Reset button. |
|  [buttonsContainer?](./answers-react-components.facetscssclasses.buttonscontainer.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Applies to container of Apply button and Reset button. |
|  [facetsContainer?](./answers-react-components.facetscssclasses.facetscontainer.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Applies to outermost container of Facets. |
